original_query: When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness, wait 10 seconds, then turn off the Office WLED

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'light' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living, office
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

message: I found some ambiguities in your request. I detected these locations: living_room, office. Please answer 2 question(s) to help me create the automation accurately.
